content: nikku ke pass hath nhi hai usne tabhi reply nhi dera

In the given context, "Nikku ke pass haath nahi hai usne tab hi reply nahi deya" translates to "Nikku lacks initiative, that's why he didn't reply immediately." The phrase "Nikku ke pass haath nahi hai" is an idiomatic expression in Hindi, which literally translates to "Nikku doesn't have hands," but metaphorically implies a lack of initiative or proactivity.
